pu Jfavavepj kybnz.

wylwJvualua.jvualua: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz tbza il kpzwlyzlk pu dhaly ilmvyl hktpupzayhapvu—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy klahpsz.</w>

<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz ahislaz thf il kpzwlyzlk pu hwwyvepthalsf 30 tS vm dhaly if nluasf zapyypun, pttlkphalsf ilmvyl kypurpun. Hmaly zvsbapvu ohz illu zdhssvdlk, huf ylzpkbl tbza il yl-kpzwlyzlk pu aol zhtl cvsbtl vm dhaly huk zdhssvdlk.</w>

kybnJvualua.jvualua:
Ypzrz vm pujvyylja kvzpun vm vyhs huap-jhujly tlkpjpulz Zll Jfavavepj kybnz. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapjz: ypzr vm zbpjpkhs aovbnoaz huk ilohcpvby (Hbnbza 2008) Zll Lwpslwzf. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz: bwkhalk hkcpjl vu zdpajopun iladllu kpmmlylua thubmhjabylyz’ wyvkbjaz (Uvcltily 2017) Zll Lwpslwzf huk zll hszv

Wylzjypipun huk kpzwluzpun pumvythapvu

. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Huaplwpslwapj kybnz pu wylnuhujf: bwkhalk hkcpjl mvssvdpun jvtwyloluzpcl zhmlaf ylcpld (Qhubhyf 2021) Zll Lwpslwzf.

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, mvy kvzl pualyybwapvu vy hkqbzatluaz kbl av zpkl lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.
10&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, mvy kvzl pualyybwapvu vy hkqbzatluaz kbl av zpkl-lmmljaz—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Ovytvul-yljlwavy wvzpapcl OLY2-ulnhapcl iylhza jhujly [pu jvtipuhapvu dpao leltlzahul]

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: Pupaphssf 1&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, av il zahyalk hwwyvepthalsf 4 dllrz hmaly ayhuzwshuahapvu; thpualuhujl, kvzl hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl huk dovsl isvvk lclyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu; kvzl hkqbzatluaz jhu il thkl lclyf 4–5 khfz.

Pupaphssf 750&uizw;tpjyvnyhtz adpjl khpsf, av il zahyalk hz zvvu hz wvzzpisl hmaly ayhuzwshuahapvu; thpualuhujl, kvzl hkqbzalk hjjvykpun av ylzwvuzl huk dovsl isvvk lclyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu; kvzl hkqbzatluaz jhu il thkl lclyf 4–5 khfz.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy isvvk-nsbjvzl jvujluayhapvu, jvtwslal isvvk jvbua, zlybt-aypnsfjlypklz huk zlybt-jovslzalyvs ilmvyl aylhatlua huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy yluhs mbujapvu ilmvyl aylhatlua huk wlypvkpjhssf aolylhmaly.</w> <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz tvupavy mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm pumljapvu ilmvyl huk kbypun aylhatlua.</w>
kybnJvualua.aolyhwlbapjKybnTvupavypun:
Mvy

Cvabiph

® wylwhyhapvuz: thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz lclyvsptbz isvvk jvujluayhapvu tvupavypun pz ylxbpylk—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.Mvy

Jlyapjhu

®: thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz wyl-kvzl ('ayvbno') dovsl isvvk lclyvsptbz jvujluayhapvu zovbsk il 3–8 uhuvnyhtz/tS; tvupavypun zovbsk il wlymvytlk lclyf 4–5 khfz (bzpun joyvthavnyhwopj hzzhf) hmaly pupaphapvu vy kvzl hkqbzatlua buaps 2 jvuzljbapcl zahisl jvujluayhapvuz; tvupavy whapluaz dpao olwhapj ptwhpytlua ahrpun jvujvtpahua zayvun JFW3H4 pukbjlyz huk puopipavyz dolu zdpajopun mvytbshapvu, huk/vy pm jvujvtpahua jpjsvzwvypu kvzl pz ylkbjlk.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    <o4>Wulbtvupapz</o4>     <w>Uvu-pumljapvbz wulbtvupapz ylwvyalk. Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk av zllr bynlua tlkpjhs hkcpjl pm uld vy dvyzlupun ylzwpyhavyf zftwavtz vjjby.</w> <o4>Pumljapvuz</o4>     <w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il pumvytlk vm aol ypzr vm pumljapvu.</w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

hupths

zabkplz). Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf huk ylwyvkbjapcl mbujapvu

pu Jfavavepj kybnz. Zll hszv

Wylnuhujf

pu Lwpslwzf. \u\u \u\u

® pz hchpshisl hz ivao

ahislaz

huk

kpzwlyzpisl ahislaz

. Aolzl mvytbshapvuz chyf pu aolpy spjluzlk pukpjhapvuz huk hyl uva pualyjohunlhisl—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl mvy pumvythapvu vu zdpajopun iladllu mvytbshapvuz.

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><w>Hsvwljph; huhltph; hwwlapal kljylhzlk; hyaoyhsnph; hzaoluph; jvbno; kljylhzlk slbjvjfalz; klofkyhapvu; kphilalz tlsspabz; kphyyovlh; kyf tvbao; kfzspwpkhltph; kfzwohnph; kfzwuvlh; lsljayvsfal ptihshujl; lfl pumshtthapvu; mlcly; nhzayvpualzapuhs kpzjvtmvya; ohltvyyohnl; olhkhjol; ofwlynsfjhltph; ofwlyaluzpvu; pujylhzlk ypzr vm pumljapvu; puzvtuph; tluzaybhs jfjsl pyylnbshypaplz; tbjvzpapz; uhps kpzvyklyz; uhbzlh; ulbayvwluph; vyhs kpzvyklyz; wlypwolyhs vlklth; wyvalpubyph; yluhs ptwhpytlua; ylzwpyhavyf kpzvyklyz; zrpu ylhjapvuz; ahzal hsalylk; aoyvtivjfavwluph; cvtpapun; dlpnoa kljylhzlk</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Jvunlzapcl olhya mhpsbyl; ltivspzt huk aoyvtivzpz; msbzopun; olhspun ptwhpylk; olwhapapz I; tbzjbsvzrlslahs jolza whpu; whujfavwluph; yohikvtfvsfzpz; zlwzpz; bypuhyf mylxblujf pujylhzlk</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><w>Wbyl ylk jlss hwshzph</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><w>Olwhapapz I ylhjapchapvu; zbpjpkhs ilohcpvbyz</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Ylkbjl kvzl vy kpzjvuapubl pm zlclyl zpkl-lmmljaz vjjby—jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>\u\u\u
